tool_description: Get key statistics for thousands of stars discovered in the known universe. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/stars.
name: Stars by API-Ninjas
title: Stars by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/stars
api_list.description: Get a list of stars matching specified parameters. Returns at most 30 results. To access more than 30 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

optional_parameters.name: min_distance_light_year
optional_parameters.description: minimum distance the star is from Earth in light years.

optional_parameters.name: min_apparent_magnitude
optional_parameters.description: minimum apparent magnitude brightness of the star.

optional_parameters.name: constellation
optional_parameters.description: the constellation the star belongs to.

optional_parameters.name: max_apparent_magnitude
optional_parameters.description: maximum apparent magnitude brightness of the star.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: the name of the star. Note that many of the star names contain greek characters.

optional_parameters.name: max_absolute_magnitude
optional_parameters.description: maximum absolute magnitude brightness of the star.

optional_parameters.name: min_absolute_magnitude
optional_parameters.description: minimum absolute magnitude brightness of the star.

optional_parameters.name: max_distance_light_year
optional_parameters.description: maximum distance the star is from Earth in light years.
